name: @squonk/squonk-frontend
description: Monorepo for all Squonk UI and JS projects that need to be locally developed together
author: Informatics Matters

scripts.c:link: pnpm c set link-workspace-packages=true prefer-frozen-lockfile=false -L project
scripts.c:remote: pnpm c set link-workspace-packages=false prefer-frozen-lockfile=false -L project
scripts.c:reset: pnpm c delete link-workspace-packages prefer-frozen-lockfile -L project
scripts.i:link: pnpm c:link && pnpm i && pnpm c:reset
scripts.i:remote: pnpm c:remote && pnpm i && pnpm c:reset
